name: Bit Bird
description:
Bit Bird is a platformer & puzzle game with 2D Pixel Design. You need to complete levels and get upgrades from them. So, you can unlock new puzzle mechanics and challenge next levels.

Story

You have been trapped in a game as a bird from AI. AI will help you to get upgrades to pass levels, also he is upgrading himself with these, but there is something wrong with him. If these puzzles and traps are belong to him, why he is trying to keep bird here?

Contents

3 different color style (level-themes).
Challenge with new levels' diffucult.
Get upgrades from every new 2 levels.
5 different mechanics to pass levels.

Controls

A-D to move charachter.
W to jump.
X to interact with objects.
Space to Dash/Teleport.

Developer Note:

Please play the game with full screen for a more stable experience.
